title: Finished Cotton Goods Billings for United States
notes:
Data Represent About 40% White Goods And Dyed Goods, And About 20% Printed Goods; Goods Are Billed As Completed, Hence Billings Approximate Production. Data For December 1921-January 1922 Not Available. Source: Record Book Of Business Statistics, Part I, P. 31, Survey Of Current Business Supplement 1932, P. 265, And Successive Issues.

This NBER data series m01093a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01093a
